jobDescription: At Firewood Marketing, we value great work. We help drive our clients’ goals and success. And we are looking for a Data Analyst to match our high energy, drive, and integrity. The Data Analyst is an analytical storyteller, someone who can look at data and see meaning, insights, ideas, and at the same time elevate the analysis and strategic thinking to become a true partner to our clients. The position is an integral part of one of our clients’ teams, working cross-functionally to create operational efficiencies in data management and reporting. The right candidate is an independent thinker with a start-up attitude, an expert in the field with a demonstrated ability to handle multiple projects and deliver to senior level client stakeholders.Day-to-Day Responsibilities: Understand and tie together multiple backend data sources including Google Analytics and other relational databases Create interactive & intuitive dashboards to measure the impact of critical business systems and global client programs Analyze information, drive insights and make business suggestions including:-Completing ROI analyses for client-facing program-Consulting on potential solutions for data aggregation and visualization.-Comparing regions to facilitate strategic international expansion
